songs.title: Work
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
you wanna see me do me dirt
Baby bend me over i can make this pussy work
You've been itchy itchy hun just pull up my skirt
I snatch your baby daddy every time he make it squirt
And if he say "Work, work, work my body"
My nigga I don't do this shit for every body
This tongue is your admission to this private party
Enough of all this talking nigga lets get naughty say

[Hook]
You need to go down, down, down
And taste the flavor
Take it, don't leave none for later
This the type you gotta savor
Oh

[Verse 2]
I heard your stroke was righteous
What you waiting for i been ready for u to bite this,
For you to come learn, learn, learn, I'm the nicest
Guaranteed you will never find another one thats like this
Daddy gotta be worth like four point three  to fuck with me
He gotta tripple that if he wanna be stuck with me
Now I ain't  saying that the nigga gotta sponsor me but damn Can't a bitch wanna live comfortably
cause you know im kinda into fashion
I can turn this ass into cash, who's laughing
I can make my self available but who's asking
Because u know my time is limited I'm multitasking
Now its time to go to work!
